nodes.description: 2000年9月22日， Ryazan公寓楼因炸弹威胁被疏散并拆除，次日联邦安全局称其为模拟训练
nodes.support_text: where local authorities evacuated an apartment building and defused a bomb, only to be told a day later by national authorities that the bomb was a fake and had been planted by the government as a 'training exercise.'

nodes.description: 9月同月发生四次恐怖袭击，导致近300人死亡
nodes.support_text: The Ryazan training exercise came after four previous terrorist attacks that same month left nearly 300 people dead.

nodes.description: 联邦安全局宣布Ryazan事件为模拟训练，引发公众混乱与媒体质疑
nodes.support_text: The announcement by the Federal Security Services that the Ryazan incident was a training exercise caused confusion and outrage at the time;

nodes.description: 《Novaya Gazeta》连续三次报道指控联邦当局伪造Ryazan事件，暗示与车臣战争选举有关
nodes.support_text: some media have since insisted that something darker was going on. Leading that charge has been Novaya Gazeta, an independent twice-weekly newspaper.

nodes.description: 2000年4月8日，国家杜马以133-104票否决向总检察长发送Ryazan事件调查查询
nodes.support_text: On Friday the Duma voted that proposal down, 133-104.

nodes.description: 《Novaya Gazeta》暗示Boris Berezovsky通过旗下媒体操纵事件，并指控其策划系列爆炸
nodes.support_text: suggesting that the hand behind the Ryazan incident - and indeed, all of September's apartment blasts - was that of Boris Berezovsky, the Duma deputy who owns major stakes in Kommersant newspaper, ORT television and the Sibneft oil company.

nodes.description: NTV记者Yevgeny Kiselyov接受BBC采访，质疑联邦安全局涉爆，但未指明具体政客
nodes.support_text: Kiselyov said he did not believe the Russian special services were behind the bombings, and instead he suggested they could be the work of a wealthy Russian politician. He did not say who.

nodes.description: 当地当局几乎抓到Ryazan事件相关责任人
nodes.support_text: 当地当局几乎抓到责任人

nodes.description: Yury Shchekochikhin 倡导议会向联邦检察官提出关于 Ryazan 事件的问题
nodes.support_text: 副主编倡导议会提出关于雷扎诺事件的问题给联邦检察官

nodes.description: Novaya Gazeta 发表评论称议会不愿了解真相
nodes.support_text: 《新报》发表评论称议会不愿了解真相

nodes.description: Boris Berezovsky 拥有《公报》报业、《俄罗斯电视》和西伯利亚石油公司的主要股份
nodes.support_text: Boris Berezovsky 拥有《公报》报业、《俄罗斯电视》和西伯利亚石油公司的主要股份

基斯耶洛夫质疑联邦安全局涉爆
nodes.support_text: 基斯耶洛夫不相信俄罗斯特别部门

nodes.description: 基斯耶洛夫未指明具体政客
nodes.support_text: 基斯耶洛夫未说明是谁
